messages.content: I take polls seriously, having earned my living by cutting through the spin to see what the data really says. I set up Britain's first political betting website in 2004 and have spent the past 15 years analysing what voters are saying. When looking at the recent election polls one thing is clear - this General Election is going to be a memorable one.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats. The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Liberal Democrats this time.

issues.brexitEurope: You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.

examples: I set up Britain's first political betting website in 2004 and have spent the past 15 years analysing what voters are saying.
Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.
I take polls seriously, having earned my living by cutting through the spin to see what the data really says.
I'm not here to tell you who to vote for, but I hope this information is useful to you when making a decision in this election.
You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.
Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.
You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.
